hero.title: SavannahMonarchy
hero.subtitle: Discover your ideal feline companion from our exclusive collection of pedigreed elite cats. Each cat is carefully selected for exceptional pedigree, health and temperament.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose SavannahMonarchy?
whyChoose.subtitle: We provide the highest standard of elite Savannah breed cats with unparalleled quality and care

quality.title: Superior Quality
quality.description: All our Savannah cats come from champion bloodlines with fully documented pedigrees

health.title: Health Guarantee
health.description: Comprehensive health screening and lifetime genetic guarantee on all our cats

care.title: Loving Care
care.description: Each cat is raised with exceptional love and socialization in luxurious conditions

support.title: Expert Support
support.description: 24/7 support from our team of cat care specialists

f1.name: Savannah F1
f1.description: Distinguished by exotic appearance, high intelligence and energetic temperament. These cats are first generation hybrids with African serval, combining wild grace with the devotion of a domestic pet. Savannah F1 is the choice for those seeking not just a cat, but a true companion with character.

f2.name: Savannah F2
f2.description: Perfect balance of wild beauty and domesticated temperament. Impressive appearance.

kitten.name: Savannah Kittens
kitten.description: Adorable kittens from champion lines. Early socialization and care.

exotic.title: Exotic Heritage
exotic.description: Hybrid of African serval and domestic cat, creating a truly unique breed

limited.title: Limited Generations
limited.description: F1-F3 generations are extremely rare due to complex breeding requirements

unique.title: Unique Characteristics
unique.description: Exceptional intelligence, dog-like loyalty, and stunning appearance

pricing.title: Investment in Elegance
pricing.subtitle: Transparent pricing for our exceptional Savannah cats

protected.title: Buyer Protection
protected.description: Your purchase is protected by our comprehensive warranty

cta.title: Ready to Find Your Perfect Match?
cta.subtitle: Start your journey with us today. Our expert team is ready to help you find the perfect feline companion that will bring joy to your life.

breeders.title: Our Experienced Breeders
breeders.subtitle: Meet the passionate professionals behind our exceptional cats. Our network of certified breeders represents decades of experience in feline genetics and care.

philosophy.title: Our Breeding Philosophy
philosophy.description: We partner exclusively with ethical breeders who prioritize health, temperament, and breed standards above all. Each breeder in our network has been thoroughly vetted for adherence to our high standards of quality and ethics.

ethical.title: Ethical Practices
ethical.description: Commitment to humane breeding methods with emphasis on cat welfare and health

champion.title: Champion Lines
champion.description: Specialization in cats from award-winning show lines with documented pedigrees

local.title: Local Expertise
local.description: Strategically located breeders providing easy access and ongoing support

health.title: Health Testing
health.description: Mandatory genetic testing and health screening of all breeding cats

documentation.title: Complete Documentation
documentation.description: Detailed records of pedigree, vaccinations, and health history for each cat

environment.title: Premium Environment
environment.description: Spacious, clean facilities designed for optimal cat wellbeing

socialization.title: Early Socialization
socialization.description: Kittens raised in home environment with focus on temperament and adaptability

warranty.title: Health Guarantee
warranty.subtitle: Your peace of mind is our priority. We support every elite cat with comprehensive health guarantees and lifetime support.

oneMonth.title: 1 Month Health Guarantee
oneMonth.description: Full coverage of hereditary and congenital diseases

lifeSupport.title: Lifetime Support
lifeSupport.description: Ongoing consultation and assistance from experienced breeders

consultation.title: Free Veterinary Consultation
consultation.description: Professional recommendations on health and nutrition issues

warranty.healthCertificateDesc: Each cat comes with a comprehensive medical certificate
warranty.termsItem1: Complete medical examination within 48 hours of purchase
warranty.termsItem2: Comprehensive veterinary care during the warranty period
warranty.termsItem3: Replacement or refund if hereditary problems are detected
warranty.termsItem4: Protection from genetic defects and congenital diseases
warranty.termsItem5: Lifetime access to advice from our experts
warranty.protectionDesc: Your investment in an elite cat is protected by our comprehensive guarantees. We support the health and well-being of our cats throughout their lives.
warranty.protectionFeature3Desc: Ongoing consultation from breeders and veterinarians
warranty.contactDesc: Contact us for more information about our guarantees

featuredCollection.title: Our Luxury Collection
featuredCollection.subtitle: Experience the elegance and beauty of our carefully selected elite cats

cat1.description: Stunning boy with a bright spotted pattern and proud serval posture. Sociable, confident, and devoted ‚Äî a true king among cats, radiating energy and luxury

cat2.description: Elegant girl with a soft sheen to her coat and serval character. Observant, persistent, and extraordinarily intelligent ‚Äî the embodiment of natural brilliance and harmony

cat3.description: Rare boy combining the refined wildness of a serval and domestic character, with magnificent coloring and expressive gaze, making him a true treasure

privacy.title: Privacy

pricingSection.title: Price Information
pricingSection.subtitle: When it comes to the Savannah breed, price is not just a number. It is a reflection of exclusivity, origin and uniqueness of each cat.

f1.title: Savannah F1
f1.description: First generation, direct cross between a Serval and domestic cat. Maximum wildness and similarity to Serval.
f1.priceNote: Sometimes reaches 35,000+ EUR for rare color cats
f1.note: F1 ‚Äî it's status, collectibility and living exclusivity

f2.title: Savannah F2
f2.description: Second generation. Serval share is smaller, but exotic appearance is still pronounced.
f2.note: More affordable price while maintaining impressive appearance

f3f4.title: Savannah F3-F4
f3f4.description: Third and fourth generations. More docile, but retain exotic appearance.
f3f4.note: Great balance between appearance and character for home keeping

f5plus.title: Savannah F5+
f5plus.description: Distant generations. Closer in character to domestic cat, but retain part of exotic appearance.
f5plus.note: More affordable option while maintaining breed beauty

factor1.title: Color and pattern
factor1.description: Rare colors (snow, silver, melanistic) are significantly more expensive than standard spotted colors

factor2.title: Size and build
factor2.description: The larger the Savannah and the more pronounced its wild features (big ears, long legs), the higher the price

factor3.title: Gender
factor3.description: F1 and F2 males are valued more than females

factor4.title: Pedigree and cattery
factor4.description: Kittens from titled parents and famous catteries cost significantly more

factor5.title: Age
factor5.description: Kittens are more expensive than adult cats. Highest demand for kittens aged 3-6 months

factor6.title: Generation (F1‚ÄìF7)
factor6.description: The closer to the Serval (F1), the higher the price

pricingSection.valueTitle: ‚ú® It's not just a purchase - it's an investment
pricingSection.valueDesc: Savannah is not a pet. It's emotions, uniqueness and living status. The price reflects exclusivity, rarity and breeding costs. Acquiring a Savannah is an investment in a companion who will remain with you forever as part of your story.

raritySection.title: Rarity and Uniqueness
raritySection.subtitle: Savannah - the rarest diamond in the cat world
raritySection.intro: Savannah is not just a cat. It is an embodiment of wild grace, intelligence and true status. These cats are the result of unique crossing of African serval and domestic cat, and each Savannah is a living work of art, born by nature and genetic precision.

rarity.title: üí´ Rarity worthy of collectors
rarity.description: Savannah is one of the rarest and most expensive breeds in the world. Due to complex breeding process and strict quality standards, a very limited number of kittens are born per year. Each representative of this breed is literally a single specimen, and being among Savannah owners is a privilege available to few.

beauty.title: üåü Wild beauty in every movement
beauty.description: Savannah looks as if it just came out of the African savannah. Large, muscular, with spotted coat and incredibly expressive eyes. Its grace and manner of movement fascinate - this is real predatory elegance enclosed in the body of a domestic pet.

intelligence.title: üß† Intelligence beyond any expectations
intelligence.description: Savannah is one of the smartest cat breeds. It easily learns commands, gets used to a leash and can even play fetch. These cats love water, can open doors and drawers, and their curiosity and ingenuity exceed almost any domestic breed.

character.title: üíé Unique character
character.description: Savannah is not a typical independent cat. It is extremely social, loyal and attached to its owner like a dog. These cats are active, playful and require constant attention. With Savannah, life becomes more dynamic and brighter.

status.title: üëë Status symbol
status.description: Savannah is not just a pet, it is a symbol of success. This breed is available only to those who are ready to invest in a unique animal. Owning a Savannah emphasizes taste, status and love for the unusual.

companion.title: üåç Companion for life
companion.description: Savannah is not just a cat that will live nearby. It is a true friend who will greet you, play, communicate and delight every day. The bond with Savannah is unique - it is a relationship at the level of partnership and true friendship.
